sys_script_client.description:
Client script to automatically set the Item Cost when onChange of the Item Needed Field. ALSO SETS TOTAL COST FIELD AS PRODUCT OF ITEM COST AND QUANTITY NEEDED.
PENDING: Make sure the item cost is displayed as currency, even if field is read-only PROBLEM: attempting to format item cost with the .toFixed().replace() method results in loss of functionality
sys_script_client.name: Set Item/Total Cost for requirement
